item.title: KOS
item.description: score:153 Chances: Kosmos Energy Ltd. has significant production growth with net income rising to $22 million in the fourth quarter of 2023. The company has priced a private offering of $350 million aggregate principal amount of its 3.125% convertible senior notes due 2030, representing a $50 million increase in principal amount from the previously announced offering size.
